name: Good Gracious, It's The Cretaceous
description:
Grab a friend and help Berta get to her egg as fast possible.

Player 1 uses A and D to move Berta Left and Right
Player 2 uses Up and Down to move Berta's Head Up and Down.

Berta's head slows her down if its up and speeds her up if its down.

If Berta's Head is all the way down, she'll hurt herself by falling off balance.

Break rocks by running or jumping into the breakable parts fast enough with your head down. Avoid crashing meteors, slowing tar pits and scorching fire.
